author: CT Phipps
description:
Matthew Dawkins is an author who has been involved in the creation of numerous fantastic supplements for the World of Darkness, Chronicles of Darkness, Curseborne, and other properties. He is also the party responsible for the well-liked Gentleman Gamer videos. Recently, we talked with him about his recent release in The World Below, a fantastic […]

The post INTERVIEW: with author Matthew Dawkins appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: INTERVIEW: with author Matthew Dawkins
